name: Ninja Run (Kevin Poretti)
description:
An infinite runner that is not infinite at all!

Made for the 2017 LowRezJam in the GameMaker engine.

All art, sound effects, and scripts were developed by myself.

-How To Play-

Up Arrow/Down Arrow - Navigate Menus

Enter - Confirm Selection

Left Arrow - Move Left/Slow Down

Right Arrow - Move Right/Speed Up

Space - Jump

Space while in the air - Double Jump

P - Pause
